title: HOUR 3 - Three Word Game
itunes:title: HOUR 3 - Three Word Game
description:
In this hour of The Herd with Colin Cowherd, former NFL quarterback and current quarterback consultant Jordan Palmer joins the show to share his analysis on the mechanics and progression (or regression) of several NFL quarterbacks. Finally, Colin reacts to this weekend's NFL results with his "Three Word Game." 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
